attributes.action: investigate the benefits of a wholefood plant-based diet for the prevention of ill health
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over 50 years of scientific studies have shown the benefits of vegetarian and plant based diets in reducing heart problems,cancer and other serious diseases by up to 50%.
An ongoing study in China, recorded in The China Study by T. Colin Campbell, a senior nutritional researcher with 50 years experience, confirms the sentiments of the petition. He claims that even bigger improvements in health are possible with simple changes in our eating habits.
